Control Name: 4.2.5 Planned for component level faults to minimize application downtime.
Control Statement: Have you validated the application can operate with reduced functionality or degraded performance in the presence of a component failure.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 4.2 How have you ensured that your application architecture is resilient to failures?
